overview: Classic Pong arcade game. Two paddles on opposite ends of a vertical court. Ball bounces between them. Score when opponent misses.

mechanics.name: Ball Movement
mechanics.description: Ball moves in a straight line, bouncing off walls and paddles

mechanics.name: Player Control
mechanics.description: Player drags finger horizontally to move paddle left/right

mechanics.name: AI Control
mechanics.description: AI paddle tracks ball position with slight delay based on difficulty

mechanics.name: Scoring
mechanics.description: When ball exits top or bottom, opposite player scores a point

winCondition: First player to reach 5 points wins the game
progression: Ball speed increases slightly after each successful rally
